document_data.name: ''Sanctified War Hammer''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sanctified war hammers''''' were [[enchanted]] [[warhammer]]s often wielded by [[cleric]]s and [[paladin]]s.
document_data.Description: These weapons appeared fairly mundane. The bone-crushing hammer heads were cast entirely out of [[steel]] and affixed atop a {{SI|0'18|'"|long=yes}} shaft.
document_data.Powers: Imbued with beneficial magics, ''sanctified war hammers'' possessed a ''+3'' enchantment and if wielded by a [[priest]], expanded their minds, allowing them to memorize three additional divine magic spells.
document_data.History: By [[1281 DR]], several of these ''sanctified'' bludgeons could be found around the [[Spine of the World]], and within the ruined citadel of [[Seldarine's Hand]].
